overview: A town of outlaws - shortly after the American Civil War: The mute bounty hunter Moses Cane is to eliminate smallpox patients for the local sheriff. Meanwhile, the washed-up ex-colonel Emerson and a gang of shady scoundrels are hired by the unscrupulous town ruler Bennett to recover his stolen gold. Soon, however, the two cross paths, and he inevitably leads them to gold. Gold that everyone is now willing to kill for. No matter whom...
title: Der stumme Schrei des Todes
